Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let's break down the scenario into the process tree structure. **Step 1: Arrival and Initial Process** - Sequence: Arrival (A) -> Registration (RG) -> Intake Assessment (IA).

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: **Step 2: Triage** - Sequence: Triage Interview (TI) -> Triage Classification (TC). Combined so far: -> (A, RG, IA, TI, TC)

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: **Step 3: Initial Diagnostic Decision (Exclusive Choice)** - Choice: Comprehensive ECG (CE) or Full Blood Panel (FBP). Notation: X (CE, FBP)

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: **Step 4: The Loop (Specialist -> Treatment -> Re-Diagnosis)** Loop operator * (A, B). A is the body, B is the redo path. Scenario implies loop body: SC -> (TM or SPT) -> RDT.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Set A to be the sequence SC -> X(TM, SPT) -> RDT. Then execute A, then choice: Exit OR B -> A. With B as tau.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Trace: SC -> TM -> RDT. Choice: Exit (normal) OR tau -> SC... This matches Once normal results are obtained, the loop ends.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: RDT is not a leaf activity RDT. It is an XOR choice between FCE and FBA. Correction: Loop body SC -> X(TM, SPT) -> X(FCE, FBA).

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: **Structure Assembly** Root is a sequence containing initial seq, XOR tests, Loop, parallel AI NC, seq FAS DDI, parallel BL ICP MRF.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Final check on all operators. Root: SEQUENCE with children matching all stages and activities.

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: If initial diagnostic normal, skip loop? But model uses standard Loop after initial diag, abstracting condition.
